topic.title: ModPiracy
topic.body:
Welcome to the ModPiracy backup on ZeroNet. DrownedMods' rules apply. Only exception: Minecraft mods are allowed. 

THIS IS A P2P SERVICE, AND AS SUCH WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR LINKS SHARED TO EXTERNAL WEBSITES/WEBZITES AND THEIR CONTENT. 

FILE HOSTS: 

IFS - http://127.0.0.1:43110/12MVkvYGcRW6u2NYbpfwVad1oQeyG4s9Er

topic.body:

1595607752_191qyhaRxXEx1bdtG65iQvFddtXBj.body:
> [lupinhood](#comment_1_18yMVQNnhGWod6jkEccZu7uG5f1tCPJR8W): The speed connecting to zeronet is quite terrible from my location.

The more people use the site, the quickier it'll be. It's not like we have any better alternative. 

> [caonimahexie](#comment_1_1PH1DYEMZLb3Knc1NypVpsAGVrYgCyzMVM): Endless Loading File

Did it end up working ?
Anti-tracker extensions could be blocking something that ZN needs. I personally have a navigator dedicated to ZeroNet, even though not a lot of people need to do that.

1595700658_18yMVQNnhGWod6jkEccZu7uG5f1tC.body: Someone should really atleast do a torrent out of it. Mega are absolute pussies, they deleted stuff instantly upon receiving a DMCA request. That being said, thanks for the collection :)
